data.name: Universal Coin & Madhouse Mode Unlock
data.detailed_description:
Includes the following:
- Universal Coin
Keep this in your inventory to get a slight boost to your attack, defense and knockback rate. The coin is added to your item box, and can be used in both the main game and the Not a Hero free additional story chapter. Effects stack when holding multiple coins.

- Madhouse difficulty level unlock
Unlocks the insanely difficult Madhouse mode, which normally only becomes available after completing the game.

data.short_description: Includes a Universal Coin, and unlocks the Madhouse difficulty level.

fullgame.name: RESIDENT EVIL 7 biohazard / BIOHAZARD 7 resident evil

data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Arabic, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460, 2.70GHz or AMD FX™-6300 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 24 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible (must support DirectX® 9.0c or higher)
  • Additional Notes: Hardware specification target 1080P/30FPS. May require reduction in Texture Quality settings or turning Texture streaming to OFF due to high VRAM requirements. *Internet connection required for game activation.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 3770 3.4GHz or AMD equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 with 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 24 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible (must support DirectX® 9.0c or higher)
  • Additional Notes: Hardware specification target 1080P/60FPS. *Internet connection required for game activation.
